name: Lift and Co. Expo Toronto 2022
content: Canada's #1 Cannabis Conference and Trade Show returns to the Metro Toronto Convention Centre, May 12-15, 2022\. Starting with our fan-favorite Lift Cannabis Business Conference, known for delivering the ultimate in expert insights and education, the event continues with a can't-miss expo featuring hundreds of exhibitors from across the cannabis industry. All this, plus our famous Lift and Co. Expo surprises and a-ha moments! Lift and Co. Expo Toronto 2022 includes:​ Lift Cannabis Business Conference | May 12​ Lift and Co. Expo | May 13 - 15​ Industry Days | May 13 - 14 Consumer Day | May 15​ URL: Tickets: https://go.evvnt.com/1028193-0?pid=4868 Price: Industry 1-Day: CAD 59.0 Time: 09:00 - 16:00 Venue Details: Metro Toronto Convention Centre, 255 Front Street West, Toronto, Ontario, M5V 2W6, Canada
